statements: SELECT * FROM ManuscriptFeedback WHERE manuscript_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, comment_text FROM ManuscriptFeedback WHERE reviewer_id = 100;
SELECT reviewer_id, feedback_text FROM ManuscriptFeedback WHERE manuscript_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ManuscriptFeedback WHERE reviewer_id = 50 AND manuscript_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM ManuscriptFeedback WHERE reviewer_id = 20;
SELECT * FROM ManuscriptFeedback WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT manuscript_id, reviewer_id, feedback_text FROM ManuscriptFeedback WHERE reviewer_id = 2 ORDER BY manuscript_id DESC;
SELECT reviewer_id, COUNT(manuscript_id) AS manuscript_count FROM ManuscriptFeedback GROUP BY reviewer_id HAVING COUNT(manuscript_id) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT reviewer_id FROM ManuscriptFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY reviewer_id;
SELECT * FROM ManuscriptFeedback WHERE comment_text IS NOT NULL AND reviewer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM reviewers_feedback;
SELECT reviewer_name, feedback_text FROM reviewers_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, feedback_text FROM reviewers_feedback WHERE reviewer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT reviewer_name, feedback_text FROM reviewers_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text FROM manuscript_comments;
SELECT * FROM reviewers_feedback WHERE reviewer_name LIKE 'John Doe%' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT reviewer_name, feedback_text FROM reviewers_feedback WHERE manuscript_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT manuscript_id, reviewer_name, feedback_text FROM reviewers_feedback WHERE reviewer_name = 'Alice Smith' AND manuscript_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT feedback_id, reviewer_name, manuscript_id FROM reviewers_feedback WHERE feedback_id > 10 ORDER BY manuscript_id ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT feedback_id, reviewer_name, manuscript_id FROM reviewers_feedback JOIN manuscript_comments ON reviewers_feedback.manuscript_id = manuscript_comments.manuscript_id WHERE reviewers_feedback.feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY reviewers_feedback.feedback_id DESC, manuscript_comments.comment_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM reviewer_feedback;
SELECT manuscript_id, title, author FROM manuscript WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT reviewer_id, name, email FROM reviewer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviewer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reviewer_id, name, email, expertise FROM reviewer WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT * FROM manuscript WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT m.title, r.name FROM manuscript m JOIN reviewer r ON m.author = r.name;
SELECT m.title, m.publication_date FROM manuscript m WHERE manuscript_id IN (SELECT manuscript_id FROM reviewer_feedback WHERE reviewer_id = '1234');
SELECT r.name, rf.feedback_text FROM reviewer r JOIN reviewer_feedback rf ON r.reviewer_id = rf.reviewer_id WHERE rf.feedback_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT m.title, r.name, rf.feedback_text FROM manuscript m JOIN reviewer r ON m.author = r.name JOIN reviewer_feedback rf ON m.manuscript_id = rf.manuscript_id WHERE r.name = 'Alice' AND m.status = 'under review';
SELECT * FROM reviewers
SELECT reviewer_name, email FROM reviewers
SELECT manuscript_title, author_name, submission_date FROM manuscripts
SELECT reviewer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments
SELECT reviewer_id, reviewer_name, email FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, submission_date, manuscript_title FROM manuscripts ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date, reviewer_name, manuscript_title FROM feedback JOIN reviewers ON feedback.reviewer_id = reviewers.reviewer_id JOIN manuscripts ON feedback.manuscript_id = manuscripts.manuscript_id;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text, comment_date, commenter_name FROM comments WHERE manuscript_id = 3 ORDER BY comment_date ASC;

SELECT reviewer_name, email, manuscript_title, feedback_text FROM reviewers JOIN feedback ON reviewers.reviewer_id = feedback.reviewer_id JOIN manuscripts ON feedback.manuscript_id = manuscripts.manuscript_id;
SELECT * FROM manuscripts ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT title, author, abstract FROM manuscripts WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT reviewer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedbacks GROUP BY reviewer_id;
SELECT title, author, submission_date FROM manuscripts WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, expertise FROM reviewers WHERE affiliation='University A' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM manuscripts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM manuscripts WHERE submission_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reviewers WHERE affiliation = 'University X' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT manuscript_id, COUNT(reviewer_id) AS num_reviewers FROM feedbacks GROUP BY manuscript_id;
SELECT manuscripts.title, AVG(ratings.avg_rating) AS average_rating FROM manuscripts JOIN ratings ON manuscripts.id = ratings.manuscript_id GROUP BY manuscripts.title;
